<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="comment">/// ConstantFoldInstruction - Try to constant fold the specified instruction.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If successful, the constant result is returned, if not, null is returned.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Note that this fails if not all of the operands are constant.  Otherwise,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="comment">/// and stores, which have no constant expression form.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="comment">/// ConstantFoldInstOperands - Attempt to constant fold an instruction with the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="comment">/// specified operands.  If successful, the constant result is returned, if not,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="comment">/// null is returned.  Note that this function can fail when attempting to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="comment">/// fold instructions like loads and stores, which have no constant expression</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="comment">/// form.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="comment">/// In some cases, constant folding may return one value chosen from a set of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="comment">/// multiple legal return values. For example, the exact bit pattern of NaN</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="comment">/// results is not guaranteed. Using such a result is usually only valid if</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="comment">/// all uses of the original operation are replaced by the constant-folded</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="comment">/// result. The \\p AllowNonDeterministic parameter controls whether this is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="comment">/// allowed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
